column2: ____ controls the structure of a page.
____ controls the style of a page (how it looks).
An ____ should be used to uniquely identify an element in HTML.
A ____ is a group of elements that can be styled together.
When programmers talk about the ___ (an acronym) they mean the tree-like structure of the page.
A ____ is used in CSS to tell the browser to apply rules to a certain type of element.
Beginner programmers make comments on ____ they’re doing.
More experienced programmers make comments on ____ they’re doing things.
Expert programmers make comments on ____ they’re doing what they’re doing.
The 0th Step in Pythonista’s Guide to All Problems in the Galaxy is: don’t ____!
The 1st Step in Pythonista’s Guide to All Problems in the Galaxy is to ask: What are the ____?
The 2nd Step in Pythonista’s Guide to All Problems in the Galaxy is to ask: What are the ____?
The 3rd Step in Pythonista’s Guide to All Problems in the Galaxy is to work through some examples by ____.
The 4th Step in Pythonista’s Guide to All Problems in the Galaxy is to look for a ____ mechanical solution.
The 5th Step in Pythonista’s Guide to All Problems in the Galaxy is to develop ____ and test as we go.
